headline: Upper Uwchlan resident DiGiulio running for governor on Green Party ticket
author: Bill Rettew
sentences: Neighbor to Marsh Creek State Park, she has been actively opposing the Mariner East pipeline, fracking for plastics and the petrochemical infrastructure.
UPPER UWCHLAN — Local watchdog Christina “PK” DiGiulio is running for governor of Pennsylvania as a Green Party candidate.
She said she has many similar beliefs to most members of the Green Party and is endorsed by the Pennsylvania Green Party.
